data.name: AcceptingTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: AutoUpdateCheckInfo
data.value: O ASF vai automaticamente procurar por novas versões a cada {0}.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "24 hours")

data.name: Content
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by content string. Please note that this string should include newline for formatting.

data.name: ErrorConfigPropertyInvalid
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by name of the configuration property, {1} will be replaced by invalid value

data.name: ErrorEarlyFatalExceptionInfo
data.value: ASF V{0} has run into fatal exception before core logging module was even able to initialize!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by version number

data.name: ErrorEarlyFatalExceptionPrint
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by function name, {1} will be replaced by exception message, {2} will be replaced by entire stack trace. Please note that this string should include newlines for formatting.

data.name: ErrorFailingRequest
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by URL of the request

data.name: ErrorGlobalConfigNotLoaded
data.value: Global config could not be loaded. Make sure that {0} exists and is valid! Follow 'setting up' guide on the wiki if you're confused.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: ErrorIsInvalid
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorMobileAuthenticatorInvalidDeviceID
data.value: Refusing to execute this function due to invalid DeviceID in ASF 2FA!

data.name: ErrorNoBotsDefined
data.value: No bots are defined. Did you forget to configure your ASF?

data.name: ErrorObjectIsNull
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorParsingObject
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: ErrorRequestFailedTooManyTimes
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by maximum number of tries

data.name: ErrorUpdateCheckFailed
data.value: Não foi possível verificar a versão mais recente!

data.name: ErrorUpdateNoAssetForThisVersion
data.value: Could not proceed with update because there is no asset that relates to currently running version! Automatic update to that version is not possible.

data.name: ErrorUpdateNoAssets
data.value: Could not proceed with an update because that version doesn't include any assets!

data.name: ErrorUserInputRunningInHeadlessMode
data.value: Received a request for user input, but process is running in headless mode!

data.name: GlobalConfigChanged
data.value: O arquivo de configuração global foi alterado!

data.name: ErrorGlobalConfigRemoved
data.value: O arquivo de configuração global foi removido!

data.name: IgnoringTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: LoggingIn
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by service's name

data.name: NoBotsAreRunning
data.value: Não existe bots em execução, a sair...

data.name: RejectingTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade number

data.name: UpdateDownloadingNewVersion
data.value: Downloading new version: {0} ({1} MB)... While waiting, consider donating if you appreciate the work being done! :)
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by version string, {1} will be replaced by update size (in megabytes)

data.name: UpdateNewVersionAvailable
data.value: New ASF version is available! Consider updating yourself!

data.name: UpdateVersionInfo
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by current version, {1} will be replaced by remote version

data.name: UserInputDeviceID
data.value: Por favor, digite o seu ID de dispositivo (incluindo "android:"):
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteam2FA
data.value: Por favor, digite o seu código de autenticação de dois fatores da app de autenticador da Steam:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamGuard
data.value: Please enter SteamGuard auth code that was sent on your e-mail:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamLogin
data.value: Por favor escreva o seu Steam login:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamParentalCode
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: UserInputSteamPassword
data.value: Por favor escreva a sua palavra-chave da Steam:
data.comment: Please note that this translation should end with space

data.name: WarningUnknownValuePleaseReport
data.value: Received unknown value for {0}, please report this: {1}
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name, {1} will be replaced by value for that object

data.name: BotNotFound
data.value: Não foi possível encontrar qualquer bot chamado {0}!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by bot's name query (string)

data.name: BotStatusOverview
data.value: Existe {0}/{1} bots ligados, com um total de {2} jogos ({3} cartas) restantes para coletar.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of active bots, {1} will be replaced by total number of bots, {2} will be replaced by total number of games left to idle, {3} will be replaced by total number of cards left to idle

data.name: BotStatusIdling
data.value: Bot is idling game: {0} ({1}, {2} card drops remaining) from a total of {3} games ({4} cards) left to idle (~{5} remaining).
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name, {2} will be replaced by number of cards left to idle, {3} will be replaced by total number of games to idle, {4} will be replaced by total number of cards to idle, {5} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "1 day, 5 hours and 30 minutes")

data.name: BotStatusIdlingList
data.value: Bot is idling games: {0} from a total of {1} games ({2} cards) left to idle (~{3} remaining).
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of the games (IDs, numbers), {1} will be replaced by total number of games to idle, {2} will be replaced by total number of cards to idle, {3} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "1 day, 5 hours and 30 minutes")

data.name: ChosenFarmingAlgorithm
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of chosen idling algorithm

data.name: GamesToIdle
data.value: Nós temos um total de {0} jogos ({1} cartas) restantes para obter as cartas (~{2} cartas restantes)...
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of games, {1} will be replaced by number of cards, {2} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "1 day, 5 hours and 30 minutes")

data.name: IdlingFinishedForGame
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name, {2} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "1 day, 5 hours and 30 minutes")

data.name: IdlingFinishedForGames
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of the games (IDs, numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: IdlingStatusForGame
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name, {2} will be replaced by number of cards left to idle

data.name: IgnoredPermanentPauseEnabled
data.value: Ignoring this request, as permanent pause is enabled!

data.name: NothingToIdle
data.value: We don't have anything to idle on this account!

data.name: NowIdling
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: NowIdlingList
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of the games (IDs, numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: PlayingNotAvailable
data.value: Playing is currently unavailable, we'll try again later!

data.name: StillIdling
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: StillIdlingList
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of the games (IDs, numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: StoppedIdling
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: StoppedIdlingList
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of the games (IDs, numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: WarningCouldNotCheckBadges
data.value: Could not get badges' information, we will try again later!

data.name: WarningCouldNotCheckCardsStatus
data.value: Could not check cards status for: {0} ({1}), we will try again later!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: BotAcceptingGift
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by giftID (number)

data.name: BotAccountLimited
data.value: This account is limited, idling process is unavailable until the restriction is removed!

data.name: BotAddLicense
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by status string

data.name: BotAddLicenseWithItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by status string, {2} will be replaced by list of granted IDs (numbers), separated by a comma

data.name: BotAlreadyRunning
data.value: Este bot já está em funcionamento!

data.name: BotAuthenticatorConverting
data.value: A converter ficheiro .maFile em formato ASF...

data.name: BotAuthenticatorInvalidDeviceID
data.value: O DeviceID está incorreto ou não existe!

data.name: BotAuthenticatorToken
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by generated 2FA token (string)

data.name: BotEncryptedPassword
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by password encryption method (string), {1} will be replaced by encrypted password using that method (string)

data.name: BotInstanceNotStartingBecauseDisabled
data.value: Não é possível iniciar este bot porque está desativado no ficheiro de configuração!

data.name: BotInvalidAuthenticatorDuringLogin
data.value: Received TwoFactorCodeMismatch error code {0} times in a row. Either your 2FA credentials are no longer valid, or your clock is out of sync, aborting!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by maximum allowed number of failed 2FA attempts

data.name: BotLoggedOff
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by logging off reason (string)

data.name: BotLoggedOn
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by steam ID (number)

data.name: BotLogonSessionReplaced
data.value: Esta conta parece estar sendo usada em outra instância do ASF, o que é um comportamento indefinido, recusando-se a mantê-la em execução!

data.name: BotLootingMasterNotDefined
data.value: A troca não pôde ser enviada porque não há nenhum usuário com permissão master definida!

data.name: BotSendingTradeToYourself
data.value: You can't send trade to yourself!

data.name: BotNoASFAuthenticator
data.value: Esse bot não tem a autenticação de dois fatores ligada! Esqueceu-se de importar seu autenticador como autenticação de dois fatores?

data.name: BotNotConnected
data.value: A instância deste bot não está conectado!

data.name: BotNotOwnedYet
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by query (string)

data.name: BotOwnedAlreadyWithName
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: BotRateLimitExceeded
data.value: Taxa de limite excedida, tentaremos novamente daqui a {0}...
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "25 minutes")

data.name: BotRedeem
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by cd-key (string), {1} will be replaced by status string

data.name: BotRedeemWithItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by cd-key (string), {1} will be replaced by status string, {2} will be replaced by list of key-value pairs, separated by a comma

data.name: BotStatusNotIdling
data.value: O Bot não está a farmar nada.

data.name: BotStatusLimited
data.value: O bot está limitado e não pode colectar nenhuma carta através de farming.

data.name: BotStatusConnecting
data.value: O bot está a conectar-se à rede da Steam.

data.name: BotStatusPaused
data.value: O Bot está parado ou está a ser executado no modo manual.

data.name: BotStatusPlayingNotAvailable
data.value: O bot está a ser usado.

data.name: BotUnableToLogin
data.value: Não foi possível iniciar sessão no Steam: {0}/{1}
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by failure reason (string), {1} will be replaced by extended failure reason (string)

data.name: ErrorIsEmpty
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by object's name

data.name: UnusedKeys
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by list of cd-keys (strings), separated by a comma

data.name: WarningFailedWithError
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by failure reason (string)

data.name: BotConnectionLost
data.value: A conexão com a rede da Steam foi perdida. Reconectando...

data.name: BotAccountFree
data.value: A conta já não está mais ocupada: resumindo o processo de farming!

data.name: BotAccountOccupied
data.value: A conta está a ser usada de momento: o ASF vai continuar com o farming quando a conta estiver livre...

data.name: BotHeartBeatFailed
data.value: Erro ao desconectar o cliente. A abandonar este bot!

data.name: BotSteamDirectoryInitializationFailed
data.value: Não foi possível inicializar o SteamDirectory: conectar-se com a rede Steam pode levar muito mais tempo do que o normal!

data.name: ErrorBotConfigInvalid
data.value: A sua configuração do bot é inválida. Por favor, verifique o conteúdo de {0} e tente novamente!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: ErrorDatabaseInvalid
data.value: Não foi possível carregar o banco de dados, caso o problema persista, remova o arquivo {0} de maneira a poder recriar o banco de dados!
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by file's path

data.name: Initializing
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by service name that is being initialized

data.name: WarningPrivacyPolicy
data.value: Por favor reveja a nossa secção de política de privacidade na wiki se você está preocupado com o que o ASF realmente está fazendo!

data.name: Welcome
data.value: Parece que é tua primeira vez a iniciar este programa, bem-vindo(a)!

data.name: ErrorInvalidCurrentCulture
data.value: O seu CurrentCulture fornecido é inválido, o ASF continuará executando com o valor padrão!

data.name: TranslationIncomplete
data.value: O ASF tentará usar seu idioma preferido {0}, mas a tradução para esse idioma foi concluída somente em {1}. Talvez você possa nos ajudar a melhorar a tradução do ASF para seu idioma?
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by culture code, such as "en-US", {1} will be replaced by completeness percentage, such as "78.5%"

data.name: IdlingGameNotPossible
data.value: Farming para {0} ({1}) está temporariamente desativada, o ASF não é capaz de jogar esse jogo no momento.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: WarningIdlingGameMismatch
data.value: O ASF detectou uma incompatibilidade de ID para {0} ({1}) e usará o ID do {2} como alternativa.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name, {2} will be replaced by game's ID (number)

data.name: BotVersion
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by program's name (e.g. "ASF"), {1} will be replaced by program's version (e.g. "1.0.0.0"). This string typically has nothing to translate and you should leave it as it is, unless you need to change the format, e.g. in RTL languages.

data.name: BotAccountLocked
data.value: This account is locked, idling process is permanently unavailable!

data.name: BotStatusLocked
data.value: Bot is locked and can't drop any cards through idling.

data.name: ErrorFunctionOnlyInHeadlessMode
data.value: Esta função só está disponível no modo headless!

data.name: BotOwnedAlready
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by game's ID (number), {1} will be replaced by game's name

data.name: WarningPreReleaseVersion
data.value: You're using a version that is newer than latest released version for your update channel. Please note that pre-release versions are dedicated to users who know how to report bugs, deal with issues and give feedback - no technical support will be given.

data.name: BotStats
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number (in megabytes) of memory being used

data.name: ClearingDiscoveryQueue
data.value: A limpar a fila de descoberta da Steam #{0}...
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by queue number

data.name: DoneClearingDiscoveryQueue
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by queue number

data.name: BotOwnsOverviewPerGame
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of bots that already own particular game being checked, {1} will be replaced by total number of bots that were checked during the process, {2} will be replaced by game's ID (number)

data.name: WarningDeprecated
data.value: Usage of {0} is deprecated and will be removed in future versions of the program. Please use {1} instead.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of deprecated property (such as argument, config property or likewise), {1} will be replaced by the name of valid replacement (such as another argument or config property)

data.name: BotAcceptedDonationTrade
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by trade's ID (number)

data.name: WarningWorkaroundTriggered
data.value: Workaround for {0} bug has been triggered.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the bug's name provided by ASF

data.name: TargetBotNotConnected
data.value: A instância do bot alvo não está conectada!

data.name: BotWalletBalance
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by wallet balance value, {1} will be replaced by currency name

data.name: BotLevel
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by bot's level

data.name: ActivelyMatchingItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by round number

data.name: DoneActivelyMatchingItems
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by round number

data.name: ActivelyMatchingItemsRound
data.value: Corresponde a um total de {0} conjuntos nesta rodada.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of sets traded

data.name: WarningExcessiveBotsCount
data.value: You're running more personal bot accounts than our upper recommended limit ({0}). Be advised that this setup is not supported and might cause various Steam-related issues, including account suspensions. Check out the FAQ for more details.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by our maximum recommended bots count (number)

data.name: PluginLoaded
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the custom ASF plugin

data.name: PluginLoading
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the custom ASF plugin, {1} will be replaced by its version

data.name: PluginsWarning
data.value: You've loaded one or more of custom plugins into the ASF. Since we're unable to offer a support for modded setups, please reach the appropriate developers of the plugins that you decided to use in case of any issues.

data.name: InteractiveConsoleEnabled
data.value: A consola interativa está agora ativa, digite 'c' para entrar no modo de comando.

data.name: InteractiveConsoleNotAvailable
data.value: Interactive console is not available due to missing {0} config property.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the name of the missing config property (string)

data.name: Response
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the generated response (string)

data.name: BotGamesToRedeemInBackgroundCount
data.value: Bot has {0} games remaining in its background queue.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by remaining number of games in BGR's queue

data.name: ErrorSingleInstanceRequired
data.value: ASF process is already running for this working directory, aborting!

data.name: BotHandledConfirmations
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by number of confirmations

data.name: BotExtraIdlingCooldown
data.value: Waiting up to {0} to ensure that we're free to start idling...
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by translated TimeSpan string (such as "1 minute")

data.name: UpdateCleanup
data.value: Cleaning up old files after update...

data.name: BotGeneratingSteamParentalCode
data.value: Generating Steam parental code, this can take a while, consider putting it in the config instead...
